body_content.explanation: used when referring to the main or most important characteristic or feature of something:
examples: Basically, (= the most important thing is that) they want a lot more information about the project before they'll put any money into it.
"So what's the difference between these two TVs?" "Well, they're basically the same, but the more expensive one has 3D."
The car's basically OK, but the paintwork needs some attention.
The village has remained basically unchanged for over 300 years.
